content:
@WG-prioritization/alerts issue #93786 has been requested for prioritization.

Procedure

  • Priority?
  • Regression?
  • Notify people/groups?
  • Needs I-nominated?

ah ok here it is the issue for that PR #95753 (beta nominated).

Honestly I can't measure a priority for this. imo it's a kind of a papercut in itself (the attribute is a no-op, a tech debt we want to get rid of) but potentially bad if people keep using this #[main] attribute that eventually will be removed.
feel like the underlying bug here is P-high, cause we accidentally stabilized an attribute
the longer this attribute is on stable, the more likely it is that people will use it without noticing
agreed, potentially bad enough for a P-high. thanks!
